    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/v4

    Facet RoomStay_Query_Product

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/v4:RoomStay_Query_Product

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RoomStayQueryProduct xmlns:orghs-0300="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/hospitality/v3" xmlns:ota2-0400="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4" xmlns:ph="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/v4">

                </ota2-0400:Description>

    </orghs-0300:BaseHospitalityFacilityQuery>
</RoomStayQueryProduct>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        BasicPropertyInfo
        Specifies property information for the query.
        Details
        Type BasicPropertyInfo
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        BaseHospitalityFacilityQuery
        Specifies query information such as dates, guest counts and amenities.
        Details
        Type BaseHospitalityFacilityQuery
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
